Title: Try
Writer: Veena Sud (developer), Nic Sheff, Aaron Slavick
Actors: Mireille Enos, Joel Kinnaman, Elias Koteas, Hugh Dillon
Plot: With his secrets unveiled, Pastor Mike takes Linden prisoner and they drive around the city. Linden manages to keep her radio on and the police are able to locate them. Linden believes him ...
